text:
Paperless Parts | Full-Stack/Front-End | Boston, MA | Full-time | Onsite

https://www.paperlessparts.com/

We're a well-funded startup developing software that makes it much easier for US manufacturers to quote and deliver prototype parts for product developers.

Looking for a full stack developer with a bit more of a front-end/UX focus. Our stack is React, Django, sklearn, and a very interesting solution for analyzing 3D part geometry. Ideal candidate is looking to grow with the company into a leadership position.

careers@paperlessparts.com
